Instruccion: Connect the two parts of the sentences

opciones: She couldn't go to school yesterday

respuestas: because they have a large yard
He should drink a lot of water.
He should drink lemon juice and honey.
His mom should take him to the hospital.
He shouldn't eat so much chocolate.

opciones: We use the past simple to talk about
respuestas: experiences at some time in our lives up to now.

opciones: We use the present perfect to talk about
respuestas: finished actions that happened in the past.
He was barking at the bottom of the tree.
I put his leash on and tied him to another tree.
